column1: Services: Calling hours will be held on Wednesday evening from 6:00pm until 8:00pm with Prayer of the Incense at 7:45pm and Thursday morning from 8:15am until 9:15am in the Morello Funeral Home
column3: 3720 Nicholas St. Palmer Twp. A Divine Liturgy will be celebrated on Thursday at 10:00am in Our Lady of Lebanon Church
column4: 4th and Ferry Streets in Easton. Interment will be in Gethsemane Cemetery
